name: Departure Dash
description:
Take on the role of an up-and-coming Airport Operations Manager. You will work your way up from the training academy through different sized airports all the way to managing a Global Hub. Load passengers, refuel, and manage baggage for various size of aircraft from the small local planes to the large jumbo jets. Earn stars by completing level objectives and keeping your passengers happy. Make sure to be efficient and build those colour multiplier bonuses to gain larger scores. Keep up with increasing airport demands by upgrading your airport vehicles. Plan for the worst as winter weather can cause airport delays, make sure to deice those aircraft and keep that runway clear!

Need a break from your career but still want unlimited airport action? Switch to free play mode where the aircraft keep coming.

Do you have what it takes to become the top Airport Manager?
